attributes.action: Do not exempt Pandemic Influenza virus vaccines from UKGov  compensation scheme
attributes.additional_details: Vaccines covering pandemics currently are exempt from liability and compensation. This should not be the case. All Vaccines must be treated the same when it comes to compensation. Even vaccines used in pandemics, war and emergencies
attributes.background: Change compensation and liability rules so that all vaccine manufacturers are held responsible for  safety and that compensation must be paid to all vaccine injured and deceased parties from the manufacturer and not the tax payer. Without exemption. This includes vaccine for Pandemics.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure whether you want pandemic vaccines to be includes or excluded from the Government scheme. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
